name: io.github.clemensv/mcp-servers/google-maps
description: Google Maps integration MCP server providing geospatial tooling and data access using the Google Maps Platform APIs

sub_commands.name: start
sub_commands.description: Start the Google Maps MCP server

environment_variables.name: PORT
environment_variables.description: Port to run the server on

environment_variables.name: GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for accessing Google Maps Platform services
